## Environment and Health <br> Modelling Lab

::: {#hero-text}
The [EHM-Lab](https://www.lshtm.ac.uk/ehm-lab) is [developing and applying](https://www.lshtm.ac.uk/research/centres-projects-groups/ehm-lab#research) state-of-the-art modelling tools to investigate environmental health risks. Here you can find [software](rcode_bytype.qmd) and [data](data.qmd) resources, and interactive [visualisations](apps.qmd) of research output.
